attributes.action: Remove VAT from essential goods such as toothpaste, toilet paper and others
attributes.additional_details: Sanitary items are an necessity rather than a luxury item which is the general qualification for VAT exemption or 0% rate. With the rising cost of living, these essential items can add up to a lot over the year. Please remove VAT on all essential items.
attributes.background: There is currently VAT on toothpaste, toilet paper, and female hygiene products. These are essential items that are required by everyone, or in the case of female hygiene products, most women to stay healthy, and should therefore have either 0% tax rate or be exempt from VAT.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615923

A zero rate of VAT has applied to women's sanitary products from 1 January 2021: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/tampon-tax-abolished-from-today
